Name: Orchidea's Letter
Desc: A token from the florist. Give it to Sjal during the 141 Friendship Fair event in exchange for rewards.
Desc2: Caring for fresh flowers is time-consuming and labor-intensive, which might be too much for the Convenience Store Bangboo to handle... The meticulous Miss Orchidea has prepared some potted plants for the customers at "141" to choose from.
